fullText: Jessica Chastain brings a touching vulnerability and growing strength to the role of Catherine Sloper, the plain and awkward daughter who must learn to stand up for herself.
dtliExcerpt: Jessica Chastain brings a touching vulnerability and growing strength to the role of Catherine Sloper, the plain and awkward daughter who must learn to stand up for herself.
